mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contract(business_num, cust_num, item_num, item_name, business_name, business_date, out_date, incharge_code, incharge_name) VALUES(#{business_num}, #{cust_num}, #{item_num}, #{item_name}, #{business_name}, #{business_date}, #{out_date}, #{incharge_code}, #{incharge_name})
mapper.select: SELECT business_num, cust_num, item_num, item_name, business_name, business_date,out_date,incharge_code,incharge_name from contract order by business_num desc limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}
